snippet: A French court on Tuesday ordered a private clinic in Cannes to pay about $450,000 each to two 20-year-old women accidentally switched at birth, part of a $2.1 million settlement with both their families.
lead_paragraph: A French court on Tuesday ordered a private clinic in Cannes to pay about $450,000 each to two 20-year-old women accidentally switched at birth, part of a $2.1 million settlement with both their families.

headline.main: France: Clinic to Pay in Baby Swap
headline.print_headline: France: Clinic to Pay in Baby Swap
